comment: Claims to be drawn to Karazhan because of the ley lines. Actually, just loves Moroes’ cooking.
description:
Costs (1) less for each spell
you've cast this game.
name: Arcane Giant

comment: If you think the party's great now, just wait 'til he invites the orcs over!
description: Battlecry: Equip Atiesh, Greatstaff of the Guardian.
name: Medivh, the Guardian

comment: Come to beautiful Firelands! Where it's "Way nicer than the Abyssal Maw!"
description:
Deal 5 damage. Summon a random
5-Cost minion.
name: Firelands Portal

comment: The Curator guards Azeroth’s deadliest creatures, but it’s secretly terrified of squirrels.
description:
Taunt
Battlecry: Draw a Beast, Dragon, and Murloc from your deck.
name: The Curator

comment: Ain't no party like a Moonglade party ‘cause a Moonglade party got bears.
description:
Restore 6 Health. Summon a random
6-Cost minion.
name: Moonglade Portal

comment: His favorites are classic tragedies like "The Hobbit" and "Grendel".
description: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, destroy an enemy minion with 3 or less Attack.
name: Book Wyrm

comment: Do NOT call it a "horse".
description:
Battlecry: Discover a spell.
Restore Health to your hero
equal to its Cost.
name: Ivory Knight

comment: Please? Can I keep him? I promise to clean his cage every day.
description: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Beast. Summon a_copy of it.
name: Menagerie Warden

comment: He really enjoys lurking and gets a lot of job satisfaction out of it.
description: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. Deathrattle: Resummon it.
name: Moat Lurker

comment: A fool and his bane are soon parted.
description: Unlimited attacks each turn. Can't attack heroes.
name: Fool's Bane

comment: Come to beautiful Ironforge! Where irons are forged and the forges are iron!
description:
Gain 4 Armor.
Summon a random
4-Cost minion.
name: Ironforge Portal

comment: This is what happens when you tell Khadgar to set the table.
description: Summon a 1/1 Candle, 2/2 Broom, and 3/3 Teapot.
name: Kara Kazham!

comment: He mostly watches light romantic comedies.
description:
Battlecry: If you control a Secret, gain +1/+1
and Taunt.
name: Avian Watcher

comment: Yeah, sure. That Ragnaros "fell off the back of a truck".
description:
Battlecry: Reduce the Cost
of cards in your hand from
other classes by (2).
name: Ethereal Peddler

comment: Just between us, if things get tight the Menagerie Magician position will probably be the first to go.
description: Battlecry: Give a random friendly Beast, Dragon, and Murloc +2/+2.
name: Menagerie Magician

comment: B4 is a nice place to visit, but he wouldn't want to live there.
description: Battlecry: Summon a friendly minion that died this game.
name: Onyx Bishop

comment: He was super excited to acquire Gorehowl at a garage sale!  Then super disappointed to find out it was a foam reproduction.
description:
When the game starts,
add 5 extra Legendary
minions to your deck.
name: Prince Malchezaar

comment: What's Millhouse Manastorm doing in Silvermoon?
description:
Give a minion +2/+2. Summon a random
2-Cost minion.
name: Silvermoon Portal

comment: He’s really just a Blacksmith, but he thought the fancy title would bring in more business.
description: Battlecry: Summon a 0/5 minion with Taunt.
name: Arcanosmith

comment: He used to play every part, until Moroes confiscated his Orb of Deception.
description: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 copy of a random minion in your deck.
name: Barnes

comment: Now that's a world champion cheesecake!
description:
Whenever you cast a spell, restore 3 Health to
your hero.
name: Priest of the Feast

comment: You can easily defeat her by either dealing 4 damage, or dropping a house on her.
description: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random basic_Totem.
name: Wicked Witchdoctor

comment: Form ranks! Everyone into the King's Tuskarr Defense!
description: For each enemy minion, summon a 1/1 Pawn with Taunt.
name: Protect the King!

comment: She's practically GIVING your secrets away!
description: Your Secrets cost (0).
name: Cloaked Huntress

comment: For a proper setting, place the deadly fork after the salad fork, but before the dinner fork.
description: Deathrattle: Add a 3/2 weapon to your hand.
name: Deadly Fork

comment: Moroes runs an army of stewards, but still ends up inflating the balloons himself.
description:
Stealth
At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Steward.
name: Moroes

comment: Originally joined to be Arcanagos’ Templar, but has to admit that ordering pizza has become waaaay easier.
description: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, summon two 1/1 Whelps.
name: Nightbane Templar

comment: You have to admit, they make a cute couple.
description:
Battlecry: Summon a
1/3 Spider.
name: Pantry Spider

comment: From the secret research labs of the Swiss Army.
description: If you discard this minion, summon it.
name: Silverware Golem

comment: She’s much more cheerful after losing the ‘n’ in her name.
description: During your turn, your hero is Immune.
name: Violet Illusionist

comment: The Murloc is taking the picture.
description: Battlecry: Give a random friendly Beast, Dragon, and Murloc +1/+1.
name: Zoobot

comment: "I know some new tricks, a lot of good tricks. I will show them to you. Medivh will not mind at all if I do."
description: Secret: After your opponent casts a spell, summon a 4/2 Panther with Stealth.
name: Cat Trick

comment: They bill this as a popular resort attraction, but they try and get your money up front.
description:
Deal_1_damage to_all_enemy_minions. Summon_a_random
1-Cost minion.
name: Maelstrom Portal

comment: Even better than a hot shower with vigorous scrubbing!
description: Silence a friendly minion. Draw a card.
name: Purify

comment: "Goodness! What… abundant drool you have."
description: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/2 Big Bad Wolf.
name: Kindly Grandmother

comment: "Magus Medivh sir, I've brought the flaming balloons, as you requested."
description: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, deal 3 damage.
name: Medivh's Valet

comment: She can tell you all about the history of people not STANDING IN THE GREEN BEAM!
description:
Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover
a Dragon.
name: Netherspite Historian

comment: Alas poor Annoy-o-Tron! A fellow of infinite jest, of most excellent fancy!
description: Taunt
name: Pompous Thespian

comment: They'll be MUCH easier to use once they add the spiritthumb.
description:
Has +2 Attack while you
have Spell Damage.
name: Spirit Claws

comment: He used to get work as a Spacial Anomaly, but he got tired of having his polarity reversed.
description:
Whenever you cast a spell, give this minion
+1 Health.
name: Arcane Anomaly

comment: His idol is the Green Hills of Stranglethorn, and he won't shut up about it.
description: Battlecry: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
name: Babbling Book

comment: Once upon a midnight restive, Medivh pondered, feeling festive!
name: Enchanted Raven

comment: Malchezaar used to have an imp named Dobby working for him, but there was a tragic accident.
description: Whenever you discard a card, draw a card.
name: Malchezaar's Imp

comment: Oh man! Runic omelettes are the best!
description: Deathrattle: Draw a card.
name: Runic Egg

comment: Was almost named "Swashb-AAAARRHHH-gler"
description: Battlecry: Add a random class card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
